edu.uah.math.psol.distributions
Class HypergeometricDistribution

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--edu.uah.math.psol.distributions.Distribution
        |
        +--edu.uah.math.psol.distributions.HypergeometricDistribution
public class HypergeometricDistribution
extends Distribution

This class models the hypergeometric distribution with parameters m (population size), n (sample size), and r (number of type 1 objects)
